mapper.insert: insert into lre_server.sys_user (user_id, user_name, password, mobile, email, sex, age, create_time, status) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update lre_server.sys_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, password, mobile, email, sex, age, create_time, status from lre_server.sys_user
